resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <entry>73017</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>68795b5b-bae3-495e-89f7-4917afb47970#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az indol</string>
            <string language="en">Indol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Indol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Indole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Indol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Indolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Indol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Indol</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az indol szerkezetét bemutató ábra</string>
            <string language="en">Illustration presenting the structure of indol</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">nitrogéntartalmú heteroaromás vegyületek,  nitrogéntartalmú szerves vegyületek,  </string>
            <string language="en">nitrogenous heteroaromatic compounds,  nitrogenous organic compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung, welche die Struktur des Indols 
darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illustration présentant la structure de l'indole</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilustração que apresenta a estrutura do indol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione che presenta la struttura di 
indolo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση που παρουσιάζει τη δομή indol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ilustración que presenta la estructura del 
indol</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stickstoffhaltige heteroaromatic Mittel, 
stickstoffhaltige organische Mittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">composés heteroaromatic azotés, composés organiques 
azotés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compostos heteroaromatic nitrogenous, compostos 
orgânicos nitrogenous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">residui heteroaromatic azotati, residui organici 
azotati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αζωτούχες heteroaromatic ενώσεις, αζωτούχες οργανικές 
ενώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">compuestos heteroaromatic nitrogenados, compuestos 
orgánicos nitrogenados</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
